title: Where has it gone?!
body:
**"Takedowns", "Wins" and "Creep Score"** for classic and aram games.
So far I'm enjoying the new alpha client, but where has this information gone?
Is it hidden somewhere outside of the profile tab, or has it mistakenly been removed from the client?
It's always a bit of fun to compare scores with friends and keep track of your total wins.
If it has been removed, **when** is it coming back?

replies.body: I would like to have it back. My profile looks like I played for a few months even though I have been playing for 5 years, just because I didn't play ranked for a while

It doesn't look like it is needed. Not many people pay attention those scores in the first place. And even though you may do that, and enjoy looking at them keep in mind that they are also not going to include Item Sets, but they will accept 3rd parties to do item sets just like you can look up player information on 3rd party websites.
